actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Education Department, OMB.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Education, Arts, and Humanities

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Education to identify and address the unique needs of immigrants in the United States taking into account that immigrants are concentrated in a select number of identifiable cities, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Education Gateway City Act of 1983 - Directs the Secretary of Education to: (1) conduct a study, in consultation with the Commissioner of Immigration and Naturalization and concerned city officials and individuals, to assess Department of Education efforts in response to the unique educational needs in areas of high immigrant concentration; and (2) report to the Congress within one year.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Education to identify and address the unique needs of immigrants in the United States taking into account that immigrants are concentrated in a select number of identifiable cities, and for other purposes.
